About Me

and my experiences

Hi! I am a Software Engineer currently working at Microsoft Redmond. Few areas I am passionate about are web, cloud and AI development. Always looking for the next challenge.

Lifelong learner. Gator alumnus. Chai enthusiast.

Microsoft

Software Engineering Intern

Worked in the CFE team to improve user experience in Microsoft's contract management system. Project involved: training an ML model to predict workflow duration and designing a visual graph to show optimum actions.

AQA

Software Engineering Intern

Developed build tools using Ruby and yaml to allow for streamlined collaboration between developers and created ruby modules to automate manual UI component creation.

NWFL C Stores

Office Administrator

Audited daily ledgers for C-stores and managed purchase orders for various vendors. Developed and maintained the inventory system for all stores
